document.full_text: president hamid karzai warned nato-led forces in afghanistan on tuesday they were at risk of being seen as an occupying force rather than an ally after a spate of civilian casualties, and said he would take unspecified action if they continue.
document.title: karzai warns nato not to become "occupying force"
lines_and_colors: president hamid karzai warned nato-led forces in afghanistan on tuesday they were at risk of being seen as an occupying force rather than an ally after a spate of civilian casualties, and said he would take unspecified action if they continue.
